structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXV. TASK FORCE ON GOVERNMENTAL STRUCTURE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1922. Membership.
The Task Force shall consist of the Vice-Chairman of the County Commission, who shall be the Chair of the Task Force, and three (3) additional County Commissioners selected by the Chairman of the County Commission.
The Mayor shall, at his discretion, serve as the fifth voting member of the Task Force.
